item.description: TitusPi is a raspberrypi desktop that can play retro games and also substitute for a full desktop.

item.title: Replace Google Fonts With Bunny Fonts
item.description: Did you know Google Fonts is bloated and can cause longer load times? Bunny fonts to the rescue!

item.title: Flatseal: The Best Flatpak Addon
item.description: Managing Flatpak permissions and file storage outside of the flatpak can be difficult to manage. Flatseal fixes all that!

item.title: Script for Optimizing Images
item.description: Optimizing images is easy with this script! Img-optimizer + ImageMagicK leverages multiple CLI tools to give the best results.

item.title: Fix Screen Tearing Linux
item.description: The guide shows you ALL the methods to remove screen tearing. VSync, Monitor Composition, and Drivers that are problem childs.
